values: Our Eyes Are on You, Lord: Thoughts on Pastoral SuccessionOur Eyes Are on You, Lord: Thoughts on Pastoral Succession

Sooner or later, every leader will hand off the baton to the next generation — and where better to center pastoral succession than in the word of God himself?Sooner or later, every leader will hand off the baton to the next generation — and where better to center pastoral succession than in the word of God himself?
